name: AR Space Battles
description:
Instructions for playing this AR Game:-

This game uses the gyroscope sensor of your phone, so before playing, ensure your phone has a gyroscope sensor.

Move your phone to move around in the game and press the Red Button on the dashboard of your starship to shoot laser bullets.

Important:- When you launch this game for the first time, you have to give it permissions to use your camera so as to Augment game world with the real world. And during the first launch, it won't be able to render real-world scene so launch it for the 2nd time and will be able to see that game is working perfectly.


As the Protector of Galaxies, you must destroy all enemies! Destroyed enemy spaceships respawn after 5 seconds.

I appreciate your honest review and will update the game/add new features based on your feedback!

What' new in this version:-

*Have implemented a Score system for the game so you can now see the number of enemy ships you have destroyed

*Have added a soothing Space Music to the AR Game, so you will enjoy listening to it while playing

* In v3.3 to Asteroids will be spawned at random locations

*Added missiles with flares in 3 directions to shoot enemy spaceships
instead of laser bullets.

*Added more planets and made changes so that more no of enemy
spaceships can spawn at random locations so as to increase the thrill.
